name: MISSION QUASAR
description:
This is your entry into the eternal void, Dr. K Sivan will be there to guide you and help you figure out things. 

Imagine you being alone in the void, this is your journey, you representing humanity.

Make your step and don't let our shoulders droop.

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Use arrow keys to navigate.

2. Use spacebar to shoot.

3. Shoot down the aliens and asteroids which are moving relatively slow and are lighter in colour.

4. Your health will reduce if you collide with asteroids or get hit by the alien ship's laser.

5. Destroy as many asteroids and space ships as possible and then move to the star in top right corner to end the game.
